mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PHOTO_URL AS photoUrl, OUTSIDE_BILLBOARD_PHOTO AS outsideBillboardPhoto, GATE_PHOTO AS gatePhoto, FLOAR_PHOTO AS floarPhoto, BOOTH_LEFT_PHOTO AS boothLeftPhoto, BOOTH_RIGHT_PHOTO AS boothRightPhoto, CEILING_PHOTO AS ceilingPhoto, TERMINAL_TOP_PHOTO AS terminalTopPhoto, TERMINAL_BOTTOM_PHOTO AS terminalBottomPhoto FROM ATMS_05001120

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PHOTO_URL AS photoUrl, OUTSIDE_BILLBOARD_PHOTO AS outsideBillboardPhoto, GATE_PHOTO AS gatePhoto, FLOAR_PHOTO AS floarPhoto, BOOTH_LEFT_PHOTO AS boothLeftPhoto, BOOTH_RIGHT_PHOTO AS boothRightPhoto, CEILING_PHOTO AS ceilingPhoto, TERMINAL_TOP_PHOTO AS terminalTopPhoto, TERMINAL_BOTTOM_PHOTO AS terminalBottomPhoto FROM ATMS_05001120 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_05001120 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

UPDATE ATMS_05001120 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, PHOTO_URL = #{photoUrl}, OUTSIDE_BILLBOARD_PHOTO = #{outsideBillboardPhoto}, GATE_PHOTO = #{gatePhoto}, FLOAR_PHOTO = #{floarPhoto}, BOOTH_LEFT_PHOTO = #{boothLeftPhoto}, BOOTH_RIGHT_PHOTO = #{boothRightPhoto}, CEILING_PHOTO = #{ceilingPhoto}, TERMINAL_TOP_PHOTO = #{terminalTopPhoto}, TERMINAL_BOTTOM_PHOTO = #{terminalBottomPhoto} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

INSERT INTO ATMS_05001120 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, OVERHAUL_DATE, CORNER_NAME, PHOTO_URL, OUTSIDE_BILLBOARD_PHOTO, GATE_PHOTO, FLOAR_PHOTO, BOOTH_LEFT_PHOTO, BOOTH_RIGHT_PHOTO, CEILING_PHOTO, TERMINAL_TOP_PHOTO, TERMINAL_BOTTOM_PHOTO ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{overhaulDate}, #{cornerName}, #{photoUrl}, #{outsideBillboardPhoto}, #{gatePhoto}, #{floarPhoto}, #{boothLeftPhoto}, #{boothRightPhoto}, #{ceilingPhoto}, #{terminalTopPhoto}, #{terminalBottomPhoto} )
